body_html:
@soumith Please ignore the previous comment. That seems to be a separate issue (possibly with THCTensorTypeUtils.cuh) that I may address in future refactors.

For the internal build failure, I believe it's because I missed an explicit cast in the frac function in THCNumerics.cuh. I added a small test to sandbox the issue and expect it to fail in the FB internal build. Could you please run the latest changes again in Phabricator once this passes public CI?
body_text:
@soumith Please ignore the previous comment. That seems to be a separate issue (possibly with THCTensorTypeUtils.cuh) that I may address in future refactors.
For the internal build failure, I believe it's because I missed an explicit cast in the frac function in THCNumerics.cuh. I added a small test to sandbox the issue and expect it to fail in the FB internal build. Could you please run the latest changes again in Phabricator once this passes public CI?
body:
@soumith Please ignore the previous comment. That seems to be a separate issue (possibly with `THCTensorTypeUtils.cuh`) that I may address in future refactors. 

For the internal build failure, I believe it's because I missed an explicit cast in the `frac` function in `THCNumerics.cuh`. I added a small test to sandbox the issue and expect it to fail in the FB internal build. Could you please run the latest changes again in Phabricator once this passes public CI?
